com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps

Class MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter<U extends MarkerView>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter<U>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - the instance type of MarkerView
    Enclosing class:
    MapboxMap

    public abstract static class MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter<U extends MarkerView>
extends Object
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an MarkerView will be shown.

      Create an instance of MarkerViewAdapter.

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        @Nullable
public abstract View getView(@NonNull
                                       U marker,
                                       @Nullable
                                       View convertView,
                                       @NonNull
                                       ViewGroup parent)
        Called when an MarkerView will be added to the MapView.
        Parameters:
        marker - the model representing the MarkerView
        convertView - the reusable view
        parent - the parent ViewGroup of the convertview
        Returns:
        the View that is adapted to the contents of MarkerView

      • prepareViewForReuse

        public boolean prepareViewForReuse(@NonNull
                                   MarkerView marker,
                                   @NonNull
                                   View convertView)
        Called when an MarkerView is removed from the MapView or the View object is going to be reused.

        This method should be used to reset an animated view back to it's original state for view reuse.

        Returning true indicates you want to the view reuse to be handled automatically. Returning false indicates you want to perform an animation and you are required calling releaseView(View) yourself.

        Parameters:
        marker - the model representing the MarkerView
        convertView - the reusable view
        Returns:
        true if you want reuse to occur automatically, false if you want to manage this yourself.

      • onSelect

        public boolean onSelect(@NonNull
                        U marker,
                        @NonNull
                        View convertView,
                        boolean reselectionFromRecycling)
        Called when a MarkerView is selected from the MapView.

        Returning true from this method indicates you want to move the MarkerView to the selected state. Returning false indicates you want to animate the View first an manually select the MarkerView when appropriate.

        Parameters:
        marker - the model representing the MarkerView
        convertView - the reusable view
        reselectionFromRecycling - indicates if the onSelect callback is the initial selection callback or that selection occurs due to recreation of selected marker
        Returns:
        true if you want to select the Marker immediately, false if you want to manage this yourself.

      • onDeselect

        public void onDeselect(@NonNull

                       View convertView)
        Called when a MarkerView is deselected from the MapView.
        Parameters:

        convertView - the reusable view
